entries.journal_entry_description: Spice is a common substance in Mos Eisley. It's affects everyone from the highest official to the spice fiends crawling the streets. It's most recent victim is Shan'ri Toulin, but this is one victim that won't be forgotten. Here father wants to set the record straight, and you will be his instrument of justice.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Begol Toulin has lost his daughter to death sticks. You have agreed to mete out a bit of justice in his name. He has given you the location of the base where the spice dealers store their goods.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: That was all of them. Great work! Shan'ri can rest peacefully now, and hopefully I will stop having those terrible dreams. Thank you again stranger. I am sending your reward to your bank.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have destroyed the last spice crate.
